title: THE US SAYS IMPEACHMENT OF CHIEF JUSTICE ALSO CONTRIBUTED TO THE FRESH UN RESOLUTION AGAINST LANKA ON HUMAN RIGHTS
content: Submitted by Walter Jayawardhana The US decision to sponsor a procedural resolution at the March 2013 UN Human Rights Council against Sri Lanka was also prompted by the impeachment of the country’s Chief Justice Dr. Shirani Bandaranayaka, the US has announced….
